para1: Traditionally in Spain, women wear knee-length dresses with a fascinator or hat for daytime weddings but since this is a Spanglish wedding free to wear whatever length dress (or trousers, jumpsuit etc.) you prefer. The brighter the better!
para2: You may wish to bring a pashmina or cardigan in case the temperature drops after dark. The ceremony and drinks reception will be held on grass. Heel protectors will be provided.
para4: The groom and wedding party will wear regular suits.
